00019 #ifndef _IPL98_STR_LIST_H
00020 #define _IPL98_STR_LIST_H
00021 
00022 #include <list>
00023 #include "../../error.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{
00026 
00027 using std::list;
00028 
00029 /* str_list class.
00030     Is inherited from the standard template class list in order to enable streaming ooperators.    
00031     @author Qinyin Zhou <qinyin@mip.sdu.dk>, René Dencker Eriksen <edr@mip.sdu.dk>
00032     @version 0.99
00033 */
00034 template<class T> class str_list : public list<T> {
00035 public:
00038         str_list();
00039 
00040 
00043    //template<class T> // inserted by edr - should not be necessary but for some reason Borland 4.0 needs it!
00044    inline friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s, const str_list<T>& sl) 
00045    {
00046            s << "str_list " << endl << "TotalItems: " << sl.size() << endl;
00047            str_list<T>::const_iterator it=sl.begin();
00048            while (it!=sl.end()) {
00049                    s << *it << " ";
00050                    ++it;
00051            }
00052            s << endl;
00053            return s;
00054    }
00055 
00062    //template<class T> // inserted by edr - should not be necessary but for some reason Borland 4.0 needs it!
00063    inline friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, str_list<T>& sl)
00064    {
00065            string Token;
00066            ipl::SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00067            // read 'str_list' token
00068            is >> Token;
00069            if (Token!=string("str_list")) {
00070                    ostringstream ost;
00071                    ost << "operator>>(istream, str_list) Token str_list not found" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00072                    CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00073                    return is;
00074            }
00075            ipl::SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00076            
00077            // skip 'TotalItems:' token
00078            is.ignore(std::numeric_limits<int>::max(),std::char_traits<char>::to_int_type(':'));
00079            
00080            unsigned int TotalItems;
00081            is >> TotalItems;
00082            
00083            sl.clear();
00084            sl.resize(TotalItems);
00085            
00086            // this loop not very efficient! Should be done with while loop and iterator - edr
00087            for (int i=0; i< TotalItems; i++) {
00088                    T Var;
00089                    is >> Var;
00090                    sl.push_back(Var);
00091            }
00092            return is;
00093    }
00094 };
00095 
00096 
00097 template<class T> str_list<T>::str_list() : list<T>() { ; }
00098 
00099 } // end namespace ipl
00100 
00101 #endif _IPL98_STR_LIST_H
